name: My Mobit - Virtual Pet Monster to Play, Train, Care and Feed
name_original: My Mobit - Virtual Pet Monster to Play, Train, Care and Feed
description:
TAKE CARE of this ALIEN PET and have lots of fun!

TOP 100 IN MANY COUNTRIES!!!

Mobit is a refugee from a distant planet and needs your help to survive. Feed it, shower it and even customize your Mobit with tons of accessories! Make your Mobit unique and share it with friends! Join us in this life adventure and discover if you got what it takes to make your Mobit the happiest of all!

Play Mobit and have fun with the cutest alien ever!

Features:
• The best virtual pet game on the App Store
• Feed it: 70+ foods and 20+ drinks!
• Customize it: 30+ hats, 30+ accessories and 10+ body colors!
• Customize every room: 90+ backgrounds!
• 7 addicting minigames: Food Drop, Ball Match, Free Fall, Memory, Sound Memory, Brick Breaker and Sky Jump!
• Clean your Mobit and make it sleep
• Heal and power up your Mobit with potions like double coins, invincibility and youth 4ever
• Share your Mobit with your friends over Facebook
• Share your minigames scores too!
• Beautiful graphics
• Amazing audio
• Compare your standings with your friends'
• Complete integration with Game Center
• Free updates

Have fun!

Get it WHILE IT'S FREE!
